verses.verse: "This is the thing<WH1697> that you shall do<WH6213> to them to make them holy,<WH6942> to minister to me in the priest<WH3547>'s office: take<WH3947> one<WH259> young<WH1121> bull<WH6499> and two<WH8147> rams<WH352> without blemish,<WH8549>

unleavened<WH4682> bread,<WH3899> unleavened<WH4682> cakes<WH2471> mixed<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> and unleavened<WH4682> wafers<WH7550> anointed<WH4886> with oil:<WH8081> you shall make<WH6213> them of fine wheat<WH2406> flour.<WH5560>
You shall put<WH5414> them into one<WH259> basket,<WH5536> and bring<WH7126> them in the basket,<WH5536> with the bull<WH6499> and the two<WH8147> rams.<WH352>
You shall bring<WH7126> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> to the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> and shall wash<WH7364> them with water.<WH4325>

You shall take<WH3947> the garments,<WH899> and put<WH3847> on Aaron<WH175> the coat,<WH3801> the robe<WH4598> of the ephod,<WH646> the ephod,<WH646> and the breastplate,<WH2833> and clothe<WH640> him with the skillfully woven band<WH2805> of the ephod;<WH646>
and you shall set<WH7760> the turban<WH4701> on his head,<WH7218> and put<WH5414> the holy<WH6944> crown<WH5145> on the turban.<WH4701>
Then you shall take<WH3947> the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and pour<WH3332> it on his head,<WH7218> and anoint him.<WH4886>
You shall bring<WH7126> his sons,<WH1121> and put<WH3847> coats on them.<WH3801>

You shall clothe<WH2296> them with belts,<WH73> Aaron<WH175> and his sons,<WH1121> and bind<WH2280> headbands<WH4021> on them:<WH3550> and they shall have the priesthood by a perpetual<WH5769> statute:<WH2708> and you shall consecrate<WH4390> Aaron<WH175> and his sons.<WH1121>

"You shall bring<WH7126> the bull<WH6499> before<WH6440> the Tent<WH168> of Meeting:<WH4150> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall lay<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the bull.<WH6499>
You shall kill<WH7819> the bull<WH6499> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>

You shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> of the bull,<WH6499> and put<WH5414> it on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> with your finger;<WH676> and you shall pour<WH8210> out all the blood<WH1818> at<WH413> the base<WH3247> of the altar.<WH4196>

You shall take<WH3947> all the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the innards,<WH7130> the cover<WH3508> of the liver,<WH3516> the two<WH8147> kidneys,<WH3629> and the fat<WH2459> that is on them,<WH6999> and burn them on the altar.<WH4196>
But the flesh<WH1320> of the bull,<WH6499> and its skin,<WH5785> and its dung,<WH6569> you shall burn<WH8313> with fire<WH784> outside<WH2351> of the camp:<WH4264> it is a sin offering.<WH2403>
"You shall also take<WH3947> the one<WH259> ram;<WH352> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall lay<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the ram.<WH352>
You shall kill<WH7819> the ram,<WH352> and you shall take<WH3947> its blood,<WH1818> and sprinkle<WH2236> it around<WH5439> on the altar.<WH4196>
You shall cut<WH5408> the ram<WH352> into its pieces,<WH5409> and wash<WH7364> its innards,<WH7130> and its legs,<WH3767> and put<WH5414> them with its pieces,<WH5409> and with its head.<WH7218>

You shall burn<WH6999> the whole ram<WH352> on the altar:<WH4196> it is a burnt offering<WH5930> to Yahweh;<WH3068> it is a pleasant<WH5207> aroma,<WH7381> an offering made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
"You shall take<WH3947> the other<WH8145> ram;<WH352> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall lay<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the ram.<WH352>

Then you shall kill<WH7819> the ram,<WH352> and take<WH3947> some of its blood,<WH1818> and put<WH5414> it on the tip<WH8571> of the right ear<WH241> of Aaron,<WH175> and on the tip<WH8571> of the right<WH3233> ear<WH241> of his sons,<WH1121> and on the thumb<WH931> of their right<WH3233> hand,<WH3027> and on the big toe<WH931> of their right<WH3233> foot,<WH7272> and sprinkle<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> around<WH5439> on the altar.<WH4196>

You shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> that is on the altar,<WH4196> and of the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and sprinkle<WH5137> it on Aaron,<WH175> and on his garments,<WH899> and on his sons,<WH1121> and on the garments<WH899> of his sons<WH1121> with him:<WH6942> and he shall be made holy, and his garments,<WH899> and his sons,<WH1121> and his sons<WH1121>' garments with him.<WH899>

Also you shall take<WH3947> some of the ram<WH352>'s fat,<WH2459> the fat tail,<WH451> the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the innards,<WH7130> the cover<WH3508> of the liver,<WH3516> the two<WH8147> kidneys,<WH3629> the fat<WH2459> that is on them,<WH3225> and the right thigh<WH7785> (for it is a ram<WH352> of consecration<WH4394>),

and one<WH259> loaf<WH3603> of bread,<WH3899> one<WH259> cake<WH2471> of oiled<WH8081> bread,<WH259> and one wafer<WH7550> out of the basket<WH5536> of unleavened bread<WH4682> that is before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>
You shall put<WH7760> all of this in Aaron<WH175>'s hands,<WH3709> and in his sons<WH1121>' hands,<WH3709> and shall wave<WH5130> them for a wave offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>

You shall take<WH3947> them from their hands,<WH3027> and burn<WH6999> them on the altar<WH4196> on the burnt offering,<WH5930> for a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> before<WH6440> Yahweh:<WH3068> it is an offering made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

"You shall take<WH3947> the breast<WH2373> of Aaron<WH175>'s ram<WH352> of consecration,<WH4394> and wave<WH5130> it for a wave offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> Yahweh:<WH3068> and it shall be your portion.<WH4490>

You shall sanctify<WH6942> the breast<WH2373> of the wave offering,<WH8573> and the thigh<WH7785> of the wave offering,<WH8573> which is waved,<WH5130> and which is heaved up,<WH7311> of the ram<WH352> of consecration,<WH4394> even of that which<WH834> is for Aaron,<WH175> and of that which is for his sons:<WH1121>

and it shall be for Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> as their portion<WH2706> forever<WH5769> from the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> for it is a wave offering:<WH8641> and it shall be a wave offering<WH8641> from the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> of the sacrifices<WH2077> of their peace offerings,<WH8002> even their wave offering<WH8641> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
"The holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> of Aaron<WH175> shall be for his sons<WH1121> after<WH310> him,<WH4888> to be anointed in them,<WH4390> and to be consecrated in them.

Seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> shall the son<WH1121> who is priest<WH3548> in his place put<WH3847> them on,<WH935> when he comes into the Tent<WH168> of Meeting<WH4150> to minister<WH8334> in the holy place.<WH6944>
"You shall take<WH3947> the ram<WH352> of consecration,<WH4394> and boil<WH1310> its flesh<WH1320> in a holy<WH6918> place.<WH4725>
Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of the ram,<WH352> and the bread<WH3899> that is in the basket,<WH5536> at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>

They shall eat<WH398> those things with which atonement was made,<WH3722> to consecrate<WH4390> and sanctify<WH6942> them:<WH2114> but a stranger shall not eat<WH398> of it,<WH6944> because they are holy.

If anything of the flesh<WH1320> of the consecration,<WH4394> or of the bread,<WH3899> remains<WH3498> to the morning,<WH1242> then you shall burn<WH8313> the remainder<WH3498> with fire:<WH784> it shall not be eaten,<WH398> because it is holy.<WH6944>
"You shall do<WH6213> so to Aaron,<WH175> and to his sons,<WH1121> according to all that I have commanded<WH6680> you.<WH4390> You shall consecrate them seven<WH7651> days.<WH3117>

Every day<WH3117> you shall offer<WH6213> the bull<WH6499> of sin offering<WH2403> for atonement:<WH3725> and you shall cleanse<WH2398> the altar,<WH4196> when you make atonement<WH3722> for it;<WH4886> and you shall anoint it,<WH6942> to sanctify it.

Seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> you shall make atonement<WH3722> for the altar,<WH4196> and sanctify<WH6942> it:<WH4196> and the altar shall be most holy;<WH6944> whatever touches<WH5060> the altar<WH4196> shall be holy.<WH6944>
"Now this is that which you shall offer<WH6213> on the altar:<WH4196> two<WH8147> lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old day<WH3117> by day<WH3117> continually.<WH8548>
The one<WH259> lamb<WH3532> you shall offer<WH6213> in the morning;<WH1242> and the other<WH8145> lamb<WH3532> you shall offer<WH6213> at evening:<WH6153>

and with the one<WH259> lamb<WH3532> a tenth<WH6241> part of an ephah of fine flour<WH5560> mixed with the fourth part<WH7253> of a hin<WH1969> of beaten<WH3795> oil,<WH8081> and the fourth part<WH7243> of a hin<WH1969> of wine<WH3196> for a drink offering.<WH5262>

The other<WH8145> lamb<WH3532> you shall offer<WH6213> at evening,<WH6153> and shall do<WH6213> to it according to the meal offering<WH4503> of the morning,<WH1242> and according to its drink offering,<WH5262> for a pleasant<WH5207> aroma,<WH7381> an offering made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

It shall be a continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930> throughout your generations<WH1755> at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting<WH4150> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> where I will meet<WH3259> with you,<WH1696> to speak there to you.
There I will meet<WH3259> with the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> and the place shall be sanctified<WH6942> by my glory.<WH3519>
I will sanctify<WH6942> the Tent<WH168> of Meeting<WH4150> and the altar:<WH4196> Aaron<WH175> also and his sons<WH1121> I will sanctify,<WH6942> to minister to me in the priest<WH3547>'s office.
I will dwell<WH7931> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and will be their God.<WH430>

They shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh<WH3068> their God,<WH430> who brought them forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> that I might dwell<WH7931> among<WH8432> them:<WH3068> I am Yahweh their God.<WH430>
